jobs.title: Gaming Expert
jobs.description: We're looking for a passionate Gaming Expert to join our innovative gaming division in Hyderabad. You'll work on cutting-edge game development, player experience optimization, and next-generation gaming technologies.
jobs.fullDescription: We're looking for a passionate Gaming Expert to join our innovative gaming division in Hyderabad, Telangana. You'll work on cutting-edge game development, player experience optimization, and next-generation gaming technologies. This role is perfect for software developers and game developers who want to work on exciting projects in the gaming industry.

jobProvides: This full-time role offers the chance to work on exciting projects in web development/game development/software development
Join the Gaming FC Mobile team for a dynamic and engaging experience
We are seeking hands-on coders with internship and project experience, along with a robust GitHub account showcasing your work
Familiarity with Scrum ceremonies and proficiency in JavaScript are essential skills for this role
If you have a passion for playing and developing video games, we want to hear from you!

applicationQuestions.question: Are you willing to relocate to Hyderabad or currently located in Hyderabad?
How many years of experience do you have in game development?
Please provide your GitHub profile URL
What is your proficiency level in JavaScript?
Do you have experience with Scrum ceremonies?

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Join our core technology team to build scalable software solutions in Bangalore. Work with modern technologies including Node.js, Python, Java, and cloud platforms.
jobs.fullDescription: Join our core technology team to build scalable software solutions in Bangalore, India. Work with modern technologies including Node.js, Python, Java, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Contribute to our platform's architecture and microservices development. This is an excellent opportunity for experienced software engineers and backend developers.

responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend services and APIs
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Collaborate with frontend developers and product teams
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
requirements: Experience with database design and optimization

applicationQuestions.question: Are you willing to relocate to Bangalore or currently located there?
How many years of backend development experience do you have?
What is your primary programming language?
Which cloud platforms have you worked with? (Select all that apply)
Do you have experience with microservices architecture?

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: Create beautiful and intuitive user experiences for our digital products. Work closely with product teams to design user-centric interfaces for web and mobile applications.
jobs.fullDescription: Create beautiful and intuitive user experiences for our digital products. Work closely with product teams to design user-centric interfaces and engaging user journeys for web and mobile applications. This remote position is ideal for experienced UX/UI designers who excel in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.

responsibilities: Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers to implement designs
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Experience with responsive and mobile design

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
jobs.description: Lead development of complex software solutions and mentor junior developers. Architect scalable systems and drive technical excellence in our Hyderabad office.
jobs.fullDescription: We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Developer to lead our development team in Hyderabad. You will be responsible for architecting scalable solutions, mentoring junior developers, and driving technical excellence. This role requires strong leadership skills and deep technical expertise.

responsibilities: Lead development of complex software solutions
requirements: Strong expertise in Node.js, React, or Python

jobs.title: BPO Team Lead
jobs.description: Lead a team of BPO professionals in customer service operations. Manage daily operations, ensure quality standards, and drive team performance in our Hyderabad center.
jobs.fullDescription: We are seeking an experienced BPO Team Lead to manage our customer service operations in Hyderabad. You will lead a team of customer service representatives, ensure quality standards, handle escalations, and drive performance metrics. This role requires strong leadership and communication skills.

responsibilities: Lead and manage a team of BPO professionals
Monitor and improve team performance metrics
Handle customer escalations and complex queries
Conduct team training and development sessions
requirements: Knowledge of CRM systems and call center tools

applicationQuestions.question: Are you available to work on-site in Hyderabad?
How many years of BPO team leadership experience do you have?
What is the largest team size you have managed?
Which shifts are you available to work?
Which CRM systems have you worked with?

jobs.title: Customer Service Representative
jobs.description: Join our customer service team and help customers resolve their queries. Great opportunity for freshers and entry-level professionals to start their career in BPO.
jobs.fullDescription: We are hiring Customer Service Representatives for our BPO operations in Hyderabad. This is an excellent opportunity for freshers and entry-level professionals to start their career. You will handle customer inquiries, resolve issues, and provide excellent service. Training will be provided.

requirements: Good communication skills in English and Hindi

jobs.title: Registered Nurse
jobs.description: Join our healthcare team as a Registered Nurse. Provide quality patient care, assist doctors, and ensure smooth hospital operations in our Hyderabad facility.
jobs.fullDescription: We are looking for a dedicated Registered Nurse to join our healthcare team in Hyderabad. You will provide quality patient care, assist doctors during procedures, monitor patient conditions, and ensure smooth hospital operations. This role requires compassion, attention to detail, and strong clinical skills.

responsibilities: Provide direct patient care and monitoring
Educate patients and families on care plans
requirements: Strong clinical skills and attention to detail

applicationQuestions.question: Are you available to work on-site in Hyderabad?
What is your nursing qualification?
Do you have a valid nursing license?
How many years of clinical nursing experience do you have?
In which areas do you have experience? (Select all that apply)

jobs.title: Pharmacist
jobs.description: Manage pharmacy operations, dispense medications, and provide pharmaceutical care. Join our healthcare team in Secunderabad.
jobs.fullDescription: We are seeking an experienced Pharmacist to manage our pharmacy operations in Secunderabad. You will dispense medications, provide pharmaceutical care, counsel patients, and ensure compliance with regulations. This role requires strong knowledge of medications and excellent attention to detail.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Build beautiful and responsive web applications using modern frontend technologies. Work remotely with our development team.
jobs.fullDescription: We are looking for a Frontend Developer to join our team. You will build beautiful and responsive web applications using React, Vue.js, or Angular. This remote position offers flexibility and the opportunity to work on exciting projects with a talented team.

requirements: Proficiency in React, Vue.js, or Angular
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze data to provide insights and support business decisions. Work with SQL, Python, and data visualization tools in our Bangalore office.
jobs.fullDescription: Join our data analytics team in Bangalore. You will analyze large datasets, create reports and dashboards, and provide actionable insights to support business decisions. This role requires strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools.

responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to extract insights
requirements: Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
Knowledge of statistics and data modeling

jobs.title: Quality Analyst
jobs.description: Ensure quality standards in BPO operations. Monitor calls, evaluate performance, and provide feedback to improve service quality.
jobs.fullDescription: We are hiring a Quality Analyst for our BPO operations in Hyderabad. You will monitor customer interactions, evaluate performance against quality standards, provide feedback to agents, and help improve overall service quality. This role is critical for maintaining high service standards.

responsibilities: Provide feedback and coaching to agents
requirements: 2+ years of experience in BPO quality analysis
Knowledge of quality frameworks and standards

jobs.title: General Practitioner
jobs.description: Provide medical care to patients, diagnose conditions, and prescribe treatments. Join our healthcare facility in Hyderabad.
jobs.fullDescription: We are seeking an experienced General Practitioner to join our healthcare facility in Hyderabad. You will provide comprehensive medical care to patients, diagnose medical conditions, prescribe treatments, and coordinate with specialists. This role requires strong clinical skills and compassion for patients.

requirements: MBBS degree with valid medical license

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage infrastructure, automate deployments, and ensure system reliability. Work with cloud platforms and CI/CD tools.
jobs.fullDescription: Join our DevOps team in Bangalore. You will manage cloud infrastructure, automate deployments, monitor systems, and ensure high availability. This role requires expertise in cloud platforms, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines.

requirements: Expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP
Knowledge of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI)

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description: Drive sales and build customer relationships. Handle inbound and outbound sales calls in our BPO center.
jobs.fullDescription: We are hiring Sales Executives for our BPO operations in Hyderabad. You will handle inbound and outbound sales calls, build customer relationships, achieve sales targets, and provide product information. This role offers excellent growth opportunities for motivated individuals.

responsibilities: Handle inbound and outbound sales calls

jobs.title: Lab Technician
jobs.description: Perform laboratory tests and assist in medical diagnostics. Part-time position in our healthcare facility.
jobs.fullDescription: We are looking for a Medical Lab Technician for part-time work in our healthcare facility in Hyderabad. You will perform laboratory tests, prepare samples, operate lab equipment, and assist in medical diagnostics. This is a great opportunity for experienced lab technicians seeking flexible hours.

requirements: DMLT or B.Sc in Medical Lab Technology
Knowledge of lab procedures and equipment

jobs.title: Contract Software Developer
jobs.description: Work on a contract basis developing software solutions. Remote position with flexible hours for experienced developers.
jobs.fullDescription: We are looking for a Contract Software Developer to work on specific projects. This remote position offers flexibility and the opportunity to work on diverse projects. You will develop software solutions, collaborate with teams, and deliver high-quality code on time.

responsibilities: Develop software solutions as per requirements
